de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap

Class Scanline32

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.bitmap.Scanline32
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Scanline32Greyscale, Scanline32Indexed, Scanline32TrueColor

    public abstract class Scanline32
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract super class of the scanline classes provided for the five color types. It is also the only place where scanline objects can be obtained.

        Scanline32(PngColorType colorType,
           int nBitDepth,
           Bitmap32 bitmap)
        Package private constructor of this abstract class.
        Parameters:
        colorType - A PngColorType enum type.
        nBitDepth - An int containing the bit depth of the color.
        bitmap - A Bitmap32 object.

    • Method Detail

      • setBitmap

        public void setBitmap(Bitmap32 bitmap)
        Replaces the current bitmap with another one. Recalculates the scanline stride.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - A Bitmap32 object.

      • getBitmap

        public Bitmap32 getBitmap()
        Gets the current bitmap.
        Returns:
        A Bitmap32 object.

      • setPalette

        public void setPalette(PngPalette palette)
        Sets the palette chunk (PLTE) of this scanline object in case of indexed color type.
        Parameters:
        palette - A PngPalette object.

      • getPalette

        public PngPalette getPalette()
        Gets the palette chunk (PLTE) of this scanline object in case of indexed color type.
        Returns:
        A PngPalette object. Or null if not applicable.

      • getScanlineStride

        public int getScanlineStride()
        Gets the scanline stride which is calculated by bytes per width + 1 for the filter byte.
        Returns:
        An int containing the scanline stride.

      • getBitmapWidth

        public int getBitmapWidth()
        Gets the raw width in pixels of the current bitmap.
        Returns:
        An int containing the raw width.

      • getBitmapHeight

        public int getBitmapHeight()
        Gets the height of the current bitmap in scanlines.
        Returns:
        An int containing the height.

      • write

        public abstract void write(byte[] abSrc,
                           int nSrcIdx,
                           int nOffsX,
                           int nStepX,
                           int nLine)
        Writes a scanline to the current bitmap.
        Parameters:
        abSrc - A source byte array containing the color/greyscale components to write.
        nSrcIdx - An int containing the start index in the source byte array.
        nOffsX - An int containing the offset where to start writing.
        nStepX - An int containing the step width per pixel.
        nLine - An int containing the line number to write.

      • read

        public abstract void read(byte[] abDest,
                          int nDestIdx,
                          int nOffsX,
                          int nStepX,
                          int nLine)
        Reads a scanline from the current bitmap.
        Parameters:
        abDest - A destination byte array which receives the color/greyscale components.
        nDestIdx - An int containing the start index in the destination byte array.
        nOffsX - An int containing the offset where to start reading.
        nStepX - An int containing the step width per pixel.
        nLine - An int containing the line number to read.

      • setTransparency

        public abstract void setTransparency(PngTransparency trans)
        Sets the transparency chunk (tRNS) for the color types 0, 2 and 3. In case of indexed color (type 3) this is a table in conjunction with the PngPalette chunk (PLTE). In case of truecolor (type 2) and greyscale (type 0) this is a color sample with a byte length of 6 or 2.
        Parameters:
        trans - A PngTransparency object.

      • getScanlineFor

        public static Scanline32 getScanlineFor(PngColorType colorType,
                                        int nBitDepth,
                                        Bitmap32 bitmap)
        Creates a scanline object according color type and bit depth and sets an initial bitmap to read from or write to.
        Parameters:
        colorType - A PngColorType enum type.
        nBitDepth - An int containing the bit depth.
        bitmap - A Bitmap32 object.
        Returns:
        A Scanline32 object derived from this class.
